p: When considered alone, the effect of salinity on post-settlement survival of recruits was also significant (Mixed ANOVA, P < 0.001), with higher survivorship consistently recorded at ambient 33 psu (Tukey-HSD test, P < 0.05, 33 > 30 > 26 > 22 > 18 psu). None of the recruits survived towards the end of the experimental period at 18 psu across all temperature treatments or at 22 psu under 32Â°C ( Fig 3).
